channel.title: CVE Feed for Kashipara Group -- Online Notice Board System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kashipara Group -- Online Notice Board System

item.title: CVE-2023-50743|2024-08-02T22:16:47.323Z -- kashipara%20group -- online%20notice%20board%20system
item.description: Online Notice Board System v1.0 is vulnerable to multiple Unauthenticated SQL Injection vulnerabilities. The 'dd' parameter of the registration.php resource does not validate the characters received and they are sent unfiltered to the database.

item.title: CVE-2023-50753|2024-08-02T22:16:47.384Z -- kashipara%20group -- online%20notice%20board%20system
item.description: Online Notice Board System v1.0 is vulnerable to multiple Unauthenticated SQL Injection vulnerabilities. The 'dd' parameter of the user/update_profile.php resource does not validate the characters received and they are sent unfiltered to the database.

item.title: CVE-2023-50752|2024-08-02T22:16:47.307Z -- kashipara%20group -- online%20notice%20board%20system
item.description: Online Notice Board System v1.0 is vulnerable to multiple Unauthenticated SQL Injection vulnerabilities. The 'e' parameter of the login.php resource does not validate the characters received and they are sent unfiltered to the database.

item.title: CVE-2023-50760|2024-08-02T22:16:47.339Z -- kashipara%20group -- online%20notice%20board%20system
item.description: Online Notice Board System v1.0 is vulnerable to an Insecure File Upload vulnerability on the 'f' parameter of user/update_profile_pic.php page, allowing an authenticated attacker to obtain Remote Code Execution on the server hosting the application.
